featured.text: By contrast, later children are more likely to be more relaxed and sociable because their parents are more relaxed.
After a spa treatment at Happy Puppy, dogs come home 16 pampered and relaxed.
The book is not only informative but also , making me laugh and feel relaxed while reading it.
Jane felt ______ speaking in front of the class but was quite relaxed talking with her good friends.

other.text: As 19.(A) who (B) while (C) that (D) when 20.(A) relieved (B) relaxed (C) relied (D) reacted European politicians are trying to get the UK Government to make cigarette companies print photos on the packets.

definition.zh_def: 放鬆的，無壓力的，心情輕鬆的。
definition.en_def: Free from tension and anxiety; at ease.
definition.example: After a long week at work, I felt relaxed while reading my favorite book.
